feature.label: OpenJDK/JLink JRE
feature.description: Aggregates the JRE features from org.jcryptool.thirdparty.jre
feature.copyright: No copyright is assumend by JCrypTool nor its maintaines for the JRE. Please refer to the information provided with the individual jre features.
feature.license: The license under which the OpenJDK JRE is distributed stays untouched. Please refer to the information provided with the individual jre features.
